isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - FULLER 10 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS - INSTALL - AIR MODULE

step1.para: Clean all rust, paint, or other debris from the air module mounting surfaces of the shift bar housing.

To help prevent corrosion between the aluminum air module and the cast iron shift bar housing, apply a light film of high temperature grease to the air module mounting surfaces of the shift bar housing ( Figure 172).
Lightly apply silicone lubricant supplied with O-ring kit so a film covers the entire surface of each O-ring.
Install the large O-ring on the air module interlock finger boss, and position the two (2) small O-rings in the recesses in the shift bar housing ( Figure 172).
Position the air module on the shift bar housing ( Figure 172).

figure.caption: Figure 172. Position Small O-Rings and Air Module

step1.para: Apply Loctite 242 or equivalent to the four (4) retaining bolts.
Install the four (4) retaining bolts and tighten them to 27 to 31 Nm (20 to 23 ft-lbs) ( Figure 173).
Reconnect the air lines to the IN port and the ports on the top of the air module ( Figure 173).

figure.caption: Figure 173. Reconnect Air Lines and Ports
